timeline.bodyText: Do we need the ROW_INDEX_V1 encoding on all CFs?
timeline.author: anoopsjohn
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -158,25 +158,22 @@ public static TableDescriptorBuilder createMetaTableDescriptorBuilder(final Conf
         .setBlocksize(conf.getInt(HConstants.HBASE_META_BLOCK_SIZE,
                 HConstants.DEFAULT_HBASE_META_BLOCK_SIZE))

-        // Disable blooms for meta.  Needs work.  Seems to mess w/ getClosestOrBefore.

+        .setDataBlockEncoding(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding.DataBlockEncoding.ROW_INDEX_V1)

       .setColumnFamily(ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(HConstants.TABLE_FAMILY)

HBASE-21065 Try ROW_INDEX_V1 encoding on meta table (fix bloomfilters on meta while we are at it)

Encoded don't have CellComparator to use.  Backfill the comparator.
Ideally it'd be passed in FileContext or in FileInfo or in the encoding
context, etc., but it isn't. For now, will pick up comparator using
tablename which is in local context.

M hbase-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/CellComparator.java
 Adds a new compareRows with default implementation that takes a ByteBuffer.

M hbase-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/CellComparatorImpl.java
 Adds  implementation for meta of new compareRows method. Adds utility
 method for figuring comparator based off tablename.

M hbase-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/io/encoding/AbstractDataBlockEncoder.java
 Allow that comparator passed may be null when caller doesn't know what
 to use. Figure out what to use if it is null and cache it for use.

M hbase-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/io/encoding/HFileBlockDecodingContext.java
 Add getCellComparator

M hbase-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/io/encoding/HFileBlockDefaultDecodingContext.java
M hbase-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/io/encoding/HFileBlockDefaultEncodingContext.java
 Cache comparator.

M hbase-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/io/encoding/RowIndexEncoderV1.java
M hbase-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/io/encoding/RowIndexSeekerV1.java
 Use comparator from context rather than do own row compare.

M hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/util/FSTableDescriptors.java
 Hide initila creation of meta schema
